name: Basic Presentation Structure
description: Tests the model's ability to create well-structured basic presentations with essential PowerPoint elements

prompts.text: Create a basic business presentation about a company's annual performance. Include a proper title slide, agenda slide, content slides with appropriate headings and bullet points, a data slide with a simple chart, and a closing slide with next steps. Ensure the presentation follows standard PowerPoint best practices for a basic business presentation.

Create a basic informational presentation about climate change for a general audience. Structure the presentation with a compelling title slide, an overview slide, 4-5 content slides covering key aspects of the topic, at least one visual element (chart, diagram, or image description), and a resources/references slide. Follow standard PowerPoint best practices for educational presentations.

navigation_clarity.description: Clear navigation and flow between slides
